```{r}
# set sys
Sys.setlocale("LC_TIME","English")

# init table
initPriceTable <-  function() {
  table <- data.frame(matrix(nrow = 0,ncol = 4))
  colnames(table)=c("name", "date","day","price", "origin")
  table
}
dataTable <-  initPriceTable()

# load datalog
dataTable <- read.csv("data.csv")
dataTable$X = NULL
dataTable$date %<>% as.Date

# check proxy
proxyValidation()

# UTILITIES
# update into closure function
updatePriceInto <- function(table) {
  function(name, date, price, origin) {
    tableNow <-  filter(table, table$name==name)
    dataNow <- data.frame(name, date, price)
    dataNow$day %<>%  weekdays(.$date)
    
    if (date %in% tableNow$date) { 
      currentPrices <- tableNow %>% filter(.,.$date==date) %>% .$price
      if (price %in% currentPrices) {
        print(paste("[Warrning] Zaznam jiz existuje:", date,">", price, "/", origin, "/"))
        NULL
      }
    } else {
      print(paste(date, "Nova cena", price))
      dataNow
    } 
  } 
}

# update

# ADJUST by MISSING DATA
addMissingData <- function(name, date, price, origin = "manual_input", export = F) {
  missingData <- data.frame(name, date, price, origin)
  dataTable %<>%  rbind(.,missingData)
  dataTable %<>% .[rev(order(.$date)),]
  if (export) dataTable %>% write.csv(.,"data.csv")
  dataTable
}
```

## AXIGON
```{r}
URL <- "https://www.axigon.cz"

# get page
pg <- read_html(GET(URL))


# slurp price form web
price <- html_nodes(pg, "div.hero__remark") %>%
  html_text %>%
  str_extract(.,"\\d....") %>%
  str_replace(.,"[,]","\\.") %>% 
  as.double
# get current date
date <- Sys.Date() %>% as.Date

# update and save
priceUpdate <- updatePriceInto(dataTable)
dataTable %<>% rbind(.,priceUpdate("AXIGON", date, price, "webslurp"))
dataTable %<>% .[rev(order(.$date)),]

dataTable %>% write.csv(.,"data.csv")
dataTable


```
